long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Transform your GitHub Commit Graph into a vibrant display of colors with Kaleido GitHub Graph, a unique Chrome extension that brings a dash of fun to your GitHub experience!

Key Features:

Personalized Commit Graph Colors: Break free from the standard green Commit Graph! With Kaleido GitHub Graph, you can personalize your commit history color to match your style.

Dynamic Rainbow Mode: If you appreciate the aesthetics of the shifting colors in gaming PCs, you'll love our dynamic rainbow mode. Select this option and watch your Commit Graph transition through a mesmerizing array of colors!

Persistent Settings: Your preferences are stored and automatically applied across all devices linked to your Google account, utilizing chrome.storage.sync technology.

Kaleido GitHub Graph offers you the freedom to customize the visual aspects of your GitHub Commit Graph, aiming to enhance your GitHub user experience. This extension is user-friendly, highly customizable, and adds a vibrant touch to your coding journey!

Note: Kaleido GitHub Graph is an independent project and not officially associated with GitHub.
